body:
Today I finally reached my first prestige in Nebula. It's been a VERY long 8 months, but the day finally came!!!
http://youtu.be/hZ6y9oAxEXk is the video.
Skip to 8:40 so you don't watch the entire video, unless you want to see how to get 2 monuments in Venomous.
Sorry for no audio, I tried speaking, but it didn't record. ;_;

title: Hello, Magenta Star!

replies.body: Thanks, and yes I am. Trying to get to prestige quicker this time :3

replies.body: Congratz, but 8 months, isnt that much? I made mine in a couple of days.. and the second took me more..

Anyways congratz :D
